channel.title: Help with .cfg errors on linux cent0s vps
channel.description:
okay so the problem is when i start the server up on the vps all the npcs and shops are missing and have no idea whats wrong with it i would like it very much if someone could help me
[code]java.io.FileNotFoundException: ./data/cfg/prices.txt (No such file or directory) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:137) at java.util.Scanner.<init>(Scanner.java:653) at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemPrices(ItemHandler.java:304) at server.world.ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:34) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:61) ./Data/CFG/npc.cfg: file not found. ./Data/CFG/spawn-config.cfg: file not found. shops.cfg: file not found.[/code]

item.title: Help with .cfg errors on linux cent0s vps
item.dc:creator: @ck603 ck603
item.description:
@ck603 wrote:

thanks i love u m8

Read full topic
item.source: Help with .cfg errors on linux cent0s vps

item.title: Help with .cfg errors on linux cent0s vps
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

I had this prob too, linux is case sensitive, so change it to Data, and CFG.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with .cfg errors on linux cent0s vps
